outputs.output_descr:
(i)	Design and development of multi-sectoral early recovery needs assessment;
(ii)	Early Recovery framework based on early recovery needs assessment of the Cyclone impacts on people's livelihoods as a basis for medium to longer term recovery initiatives, and resource mobilization strategy.

project_descr: Early Recovery in Cook Islands following Cyclone Pat.
